languages.text: {n}Грустно улыбнувшись, Фроше качает головой.{/n} "Всегда верен, Ваша Светлость".
{n}Froscher shakes his head with a sad smile.{/n} "Always faithful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
languages.original_text: {n}Грустно улыбнувшись, Фроше качает головой.{/n} "Всегда верен, Ваша Светлость".

traits.locale_text: {n}Froscher shakes his head with a sad smile.{/n} "Always faithful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

{n}Froscher shakes his head with a sad smile.{/n} "Always faithful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

languages.text: {n}弗罗舍摇摇头，露出了悲伤的笑容。{/n}“我永远忠于他，大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Froscher shakes his head with a sad smile.{/n} "Always faithful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}弗罗舍摇摇头，露出了悲伤的笑容。{/n}“我永远忠于他，大人。”

languages.text: {n}フロッシャーは悲しい笑みを浮かべ、頭を横に振った。{/n}「私は、いつまでも忠実であります、陛下」
languages.original_text: {n}Froscher shakes his head with a sad smile.{/n} "Always faithful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}フロッシャーは悲しい笑みを浮かべ、頭を横に振った。{/n}「私は、いつまでも忠実であります、陛下」

languages.text: {n}Froscher sacude la cabeza con una sonrisa triste.{/n} «Siempre fiel, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: {n}Froscher shakes his head with a sad smile.{/n} "Always faithful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Froscher sacude la cabeza con una sonrisa triste.{/n} «Siempre fiel, mi{mf|lord|lady}».

languages.text: {n}Froscher schüttelt mit einem traurigen Lächeln den Kopf.{/n} "Immer treu, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
languages.original_text: {n}Froscher shakes his head with a sad smile.{/n} "Always faithful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Froscher schüttelt mit einem traurigen Lächeln den Kopf.{/n} "Immer treu, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."

languages.text: {n}Froscher secoue la tête, un sourire triste aux lèvres.{/n} « Je resterai loyal, Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: {n}Froscher shakes his head with a sad smile.{/n} "Always faithful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
